title: THOU WHOSE ALMIGHTY WORD
bible_ref: And God said, Let there be light: and there was light. Gen 1:3
verses: Thou whose almighty word=Chaos and darkness heard=And took their flight=Hear us we humbly pray=And where the gospel day=Sheds not its glorious ray=Let there be light
Thou who didst come to bring=On Thy redeeming wing=Healing and sight=Health to the sick in mind=Sight to the inly blind=O now to all mankind=Let there be light.
Spirit of truth and love=Life-giving holy Dove=Spend forth Thy flight=Move on the waters' face=Bearing the lamp of grace=And in earth' darkest place=Let there be light

Blessed and holy Three=Glorious Trinity=Wisdom love might=Boundless as ocean's tide=Rolling in fullest pride=Through the earth far and wide=Let there be light=Text : Bourne H. Draper;                   ITALIAN HYMN=Music: John Hatton;                          6.6.4.6.6.6.4
